properties.name: spring.auth.strict
properties.description: 是否开启WEB AUTH严格模式, 默认为true

properties.name: swagger2.base-package
properties.description: Swagger2的扫描包配置 (多个包用 ","隔开)

properties.name: swagger2.enable
properties.description: 是否开启Swagger2

properties.name: swagger2.title
properties.description: Swagger2的文档标题

properties.name: swagger2.contact-name
properties.description: 项目联系人

properties.name: swagger2.contact-url
properties.description: 项目首页

properties.name: swagger2.contact-email
properties.description: 项目联系邮箱

properties.name: swagger2.description
properties.description: 项目描述

properties.name: swagger2.service-url
properties.description: 服务URL

properties.name: app.id
properties.description: 应用ID

properties.name: app.version
properties.description: 应用版本

properties.name: app.buildVersion
properties.description: 构建版

properties.name: app.contextPath
properties.description: 应用相对路径, 默认为server.servlet.contextPath

properties.name: apollo.bootstrap.enabled
properties.description: 是否启用Apollo

properties.name: apollo.bootstrap.namespaces
properties.description: Apollo的命名空间，多个用","隔开

properties.name: apollo.bootstrap.eagerLoad.enabled
properties.description: 是否提前加载Apollo

properties.name: apollo.meta
properties.description: 默认注册中心地址

properties.name: dev.meta
properties.description: 开发环境注册中心地址

properties.name: fat.meta
properties.description: 测试环境注册中心地址

properties.name: uat.meta
properties.description: 演示环境注册中心地址

properties.name: pro.meta
properties.description: 生产环境注册中心地址

properties.name: feign.sentinel.enabled
properties.description: Feign客户端是否启用Sentinel

properties.name: spring.redis.nodes
properties.description: redis单机与集群无缝切换注解

properties.name: spin.redis.enable
properties.description: enable or disable frame features based on redis

properties.name: spin.redis.database
properties.description: Database index used by the connection factory

properties.name: spin.redis.host
properties.description: Redis server host

properties.name: spin.redis.port
properties.description: Redis server port

properties.name: spin.redis.username
properties.description: Login username of the redis server

properties.name: spin.redis.password
properties.description: Login password of the redis server

properties.name: spin.redis.ssl
properties.description: Whether to enable SSL support

properties.name: spin.redis.timeout
properties.description: Read timeout

properties.name: spin.redis.connect-timeout
properties.description: Connection timeout

properties.name: spin.redis.client-name
properties.description: Client name to be set on connections with CLIENT SETNAME

properties.name: spin.redis.delay-queue.name
properties.description: redis delay queue name, configure a non-empty name to enable RedisDelayQueue

properties.name: spin.redis.delay-queue.schedule-group-id
properties.description: redis delay queue group id, a group task will be scheduled in instances witch has same groupId

properties.name: spin.redis.delay-queue.core-pool-size
properties.description: The core size of RedisDelayQueue's backend executor

properties.name: spin.redis.delay-queue.max-pool-size
properties.description: The max size of RedisDelayQueue's backend executor

properties.name: spin.redis.delay-queue.keep-alive-time
properties.description: The alive time of idle thread in RedisDelayQueue's backend executor

properties.name: spin.redis.delay-queue.work-queue-size
properties.description: The queue size of RedisDelayQueue's backend executor

properties.name: spin.redis.cluster.nodes
properties.description: Comma-separated list of "host:port" pairs to bootstrap from. This represents an "initial" list of cluster nodes and is required to have at least one entry

properties.name: spin.redis.cluster.max-redirects
properties.description: Maximum number of redirects to follow when executing commands across the cluster
